questions.text: Are you able to remain calm and organized under pressure?
Are you patient and empathetic when explaining concepts to others?
Are you comfortable traveling to different locations for volunteer work?
Do you enjoy working with animals?
Are you calm and composed during stressful situations?
Are you comfortable with medical procedures and providing support to individuals in medical settings?
What age range do you enjoy working the most with
Do your skills involve wood working?
Do you have a knack for building rapport and establishing trust with individuals from diverse backgrounds?
Are you committed to promoting public health and making a positive impact on your community?
Do you have strong problem-solving skills and the ability to think on your feet?
Are you committed to providing love and attention to animals in need?
